result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn M Garcia was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: With Huber, release for work, work search and treatment. Concurrent with Condition time in case 22CF671. Sentence to commence when work release privileges start in the condition time in case 22CF671.

Cash bail applied to costs, paid in full. Balance refunded to poster.

Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

2:49 PM Defendant Shawn M Garcia in court, in custody.  Attorney Justin G Griffis in court for Shawn M Garcia.  Prosecuting attorney Charles Patrick Hoffmann in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case called for plea and sentencing.
Court conducts plea colloquy.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Cases 22CF1313, 22TR2490 and 22TR2491 are dismissed and read in to 22CF671 and 22CM657.
Recommendations by the State.  Recommendations by the Defense.  Statement by defendant.  Statement by Victim A in 22CM657.  Statement by G.G.

The Court Orders the Following:

Count 1:
60 Days Huber with RELEASE FOR WORK, WORK SEARCH AND TREATMENT - CONCURRENT with Condition Time in 22CF671. 
 Sentence to commence when work release privileges start in the Condition Time in 22CF671.

COSTS: $ 243.00

DV Surcharge: $ 100.00
	
DNA Surcharge: $ 200.00

DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 
 
Total costs/fine/forfeiture: to be paid as a condition of probation in 22CF671. Failure to pay;  will result in a civil judgment.  Cash bail to be refunded to poster.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 26, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Cash bond signed by defendant, Shawn M. Garcia.

7/5/22:  Court ordered conditions modified to no violent contact with Victim A.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no violent contact with Victim A listed in the Criminal Complaint/Victim Identification Key.  Defendant is not to share, reproduce or distribute any personal and/or identifying information about the crime victim(s), except to their attorney.  The Court will allow for contact with Victim A through Our Family Wizard for the sole purposes of the children.  Defendant allowed one trip to the residence accompanied by a peace/police officer to obtain personal items.  Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to enter any premises, other than a grocery store, that sells/serves alcohol beverages by the drink or into any liquor store.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  Defendant is not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.  Comply with all licensing restrictions.
